title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Power of Chaos Akiza the Black Rose (MOD)(PC)
description:
Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Akiza the Black Rose (MOD)(PC)

MOD by AcoMods (Thanks!)

Number of cards : 1109

Opponent : Akiza

Sorry everyone aboat the 600MB filesize but here is the explanation : AcoMods make high audio and image quality in .bmp and .wav files which are not as compressive as .mp3 and .jpg (55% total compression vs. 40% of other MODs) as you've seen in some other MODs. Original size is 1.10GB and I could't compress it anymore using 7zip. But I assure you guys, it's a lot better in the quality than every other MOD!

Installation : Extract from .7z into a random folder. Run the game in Admin Mode from the .exe. If you want to unlock all cards here's the tutorial :
 
http://www.1337x.to/torrent/1304562/Yu-Gi-Oh-How-To-Unlock-All-Cards/
